com.scalar.dl.ledger.contract

Class ContractManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scalar.dl.ledger.contract.ContractManager

  • @ThreadSafe
public class ContractManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A manager to store ContractEntrys in a ContractRegistry, retrieve ContractEntrys, instantiate ContractMachines from their ids, and also validate contracts (i.e. check if the contract is registered with the correct signature).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public void register(ContractEntry entry)
        Stores a ContractEntry in a ContractRegistry. It will first check if the ContractEntry is stored in the ContractRegistry, and if so, throw a DatabaseException and fail. Otherwise, it will store it in the ContractRegistry.
        Parameters:
        entry - a ContractEntry

      • get

        public ContractEntry get(ContractEntry.Key key)
        Returns a ContractEntry. It will retrieve it from the ContractRegistry.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the ContractEntry to retrieve
        Returns:
        a ContractEntry

      • scan

        public java.util.List<ContractEntry> scan(CertificateEntry.Key key)
        Returns a list of all the ContractEntrys of a specific version registered by a specified certificate holder.
        Parameters:
        key - a CertificateEntry.Key specifying a certificate holder id and certificate version.
        Returns:
        a list of ContractEntrys

      • getInstance

        public ContractMachine getInstance(ContractEntry entry)
        Instantiates a ContractMachine from the specified contract entry.
        Parameters:
        entry - the entry of the ContractMachine to retrieve
        Returns:
        a ContractMachine
